string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Everybody's a billionaire in this chair! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: They're seriously fun guys! They are also fungi. That was the joke. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: EXP Buff for purchasers of the Maple Basic Value Pack. EXP increases will remain in effect while the Value Pack is active, and only up to Lv. 100.\n#cLv. 1 - 29: EXP +50% \n Lv. 30 - 100: EXP +20%#

string.name: desc
string.value: EXP Buff for purchasers of the Maple Special Value Pack. EXP increases will remain in effect while the Value Pack is active. \n#cLv. 1 - 29: EXP +50% \n Lv. 30 - 200: EXP +20%#

string.name: desc
string.value: Special Weapon Box for purchasers of the Maple Value Pack. Contains one Lv. 35, 65, or 95 Chaos Weapon for your job, depending on your level.

string.name: desc
string.value: EXP Buff for purchasers of the Upgrade Value Pack. EXP increases will remain in effect while the Value Pack is active. \n#cLv. 1 - 29: EXP +50% \n Lv. 30 - 200: EXP +20%#

string.name: desc
string.value: A small candle from the Admin. This candle will turn itself off when the game is ended.

string.name: desc
string.value: A candle used on the birthday cake for the 4th anniversary of Maplestory. The flame will be blown out when the player exits the game and lit again upon returning to the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: A memory chip Agent W left with me. Information regarding 'Master M' is said to be contained in it. If I don't enter the secret code every hour, it will self-destruct.

string.name: desc
string.value: Mr. Oh sells these rare spices at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can find these memorabilia from Thailand at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell them to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lena sells delicious unagi at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: This taxydermy shark, handmade by Tae Gong himself, can be found at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hanako sells this exquisite at the Maple 7th Day Market. You can sell it to Abdula for a profit.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Giant Star that Cassandra made for you. If you hold it during the Starlight Festival, you can receive 1 Star Stamp every hour. \n#cDisappears when you log out of the game.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter N that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter E that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter W that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Letter S that looks like it would fit perfectly on the Empty Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Maple Leaf that signifies Maple Story's 5 year journey. Something good will happen if you hold onto it for 1 hour.

string.name: desc
string.value: Entrance Level: Lv. 30 or above\nRecommended Level: Lv. 30 - Lv. 49

string.name: desc
string.value: Entrance Level: Lv. 50 or above\nRecommended Level: Lv. 50 - Lv. 69

string.name: desc

string.value: Entrance Level: Lv. 90 or above\nRecommended Level: Lv. 90 - Lv. 119

string.name: desc
string.value: An unknown being that has yet to be explained.

string.name: desc
string.value: A solid ice crystal that contains Maha Charm. Hold onto it for one hour and the crystal will melt, enabling you to acquire the Charm.

string.name: desc
string.value: A charm that contains protection from Maha, the spirit of Polearm. Take this to Cassandra for a chance to answer questions and receive prizes.

string.name: desc
string.value: A small candle given by Cassandra. This candle will turn off automatically when the game ends.

string.name: desc
string.value: Box with Cassandra's PC Cafe Giant Star. Stay online with this for 90 minutes to transform it into Cassandra's PC Cafe Giant Star. Disappears when you log out.

string.name: desc
string.value: PC Cafe Giant Star that Cassandra is looking for. Disappears when you log out.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold onto this for 30 minutes and the cold weather will turn it into slush. It's so delicate it will disappear if you log out.

string.name: desc
string.value: Give it to Cassandra before it disappears!

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini Dragon Egg that Cassandra has left in your care. You must hold it close and keep it warm for one hour for it to hatch. Logging out will cause it to be destroyed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Mini Dragon that hatched from the egg Cassandra left with you. Return it to Cassandra to receive a reward!

string.name: desc
string.value: An empty compass that will eventually be used to make a Golden Compass.

string.name: desc
string.value: A black feather from a bird that has not been identified. Keep an eye on it for 15 minutes and it will transform into a Bright Feather.\n#cIt will disappear once you log out.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A bright feather from a bird that has not been identified. Take it over to the Maple Admin.

string.name: desc
string.value: A large star specially made to commemorate MapleStory's 6th anniversary. Carry it with you for 45 minutes to receive a Star Stamp.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Hawkeye sticker. Collect all 5 Cygnus Knights stickers to receive a limited reward.

string.name: desc
string.value: It takes 2 hours for the sand in Carta's Sandglass to trickle down to the bottom.

string.name: desc
string.value: The sand in Carta's Sandglass has trickled down to the bottom.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: If you log in everyday and play for an hour, You can upgrade the stat of evolving ring everyday. If you log out before one hour, you will need to come back to Gaga and stay for an hour again to upgrade your ring.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: name
string.value: Marble That Evolves Into A Belt After 30 Minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: Gold Richie gave you this item, claiming he has absolutely no idea what it is. Make sure you leave more than 1 slot empty in your EQUIP inventory after 30 minutes.

string.name: desc
string.value: After 1 hour the gem changes into an item that can be used to upgrade the Evolving Belt. Make sure you leave more than 1 slot empty in your USE inventory after 1 hour.

string.name: desc

string.value: Entrance Level: Lv. 120 or above\nRecommended Level: Lv. 120

string.name: desc

string.value: Sweet chocolate perfect for Valentine's Day. You can exchange 100 of these for 1 Valentine's Day Box from Cassandra in the town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Valentine's Day chocolate where you can write a message of love on. Keep it in the Set-up tab for 30 minutes and your feelings just might reach that special someone!

string.value: Looks like a beautiful spring flower. Hold on to it for 30 minute and enjoy the spring breeze to receive a Star Stamp from Cassandra.

string.name: desc
string.value: Colored sugar that glitters beautifully. Used to make homemade sugar.

string.name: desc
string.value: Crystal Ball that Cassandra entrusted to you. Hold on to it for 30 minutes to see your fortune for this year in the relationship department.

string.name: desc
string.value: This one is sparkling with fountains of lovely fortunes. Bring it to Cassandra to hear your fortune on *wink wink*.

string.name: desc
string.value: A delicate brush used to color Easter Eggs.\r\nKeep it in your Inventory Set-up tab for 30 minutes to receive a Shiny Easter Egg Buff.\r\n

string.name: desc
string.value: It's nice and shiny, but it still needs a bit more work. Try making it even fancier!\r\nKeep it in your Inventory Set-up tab for 30 minutes to receive a Shiny Easter Egg Buff.

string.name: desc
string.value: A stone containing the power of Virtue. The stone absorbs power every time you strike a monster. When the stone is full, you can use the basic attack key to use Virtue's Blessing, which lasts for 1 hour and can be stacked with other buffs.\r\n#cWhile Virtue's Blessing is in effect, the stone will no longer absorb power. The strength of the blessing will also increase when you reach Level 31 and Level 71.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A dirty camera that contains memories of Zakum... and much more.

string.name: desc
string.value: Lifts hot-air balloons off the ground! What did you expect?

string.name: desc
string.value: This thing will find ANYTHING... whether you want it to or not.

string.name: desc
string.value: An old map of the excavation site that you probably saw in the Gonzo Gallery.

string.name: desc
string.value: A compass that's essential for pin-pointing artifact locations.

string.name: desc
string.value: Spiegelmann's mustache comb. Having a well-groomed moustache is supposed to raise your chances of finding artifacts...

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Eye drops for Spiegelmann's wrinkly old eyeballs.

string.value: A very spicy looking chicken. You can drag this to put it in the Picnic Basket.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the key elements of becoming a Mesoranger. Truly only the trusting are fit to be heroes.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the key elements of becoming a Mesoranger. A nice smile can brighten up any day!

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the key elements of becoming a Mesoranger. Obviously you need to be able to rock that suit.

string.name: desc
string.value: One of the key elements of becoming a Mesoranger. It helps to be smart, and be calm.

string.name: name
string.value: A Better You: Becoming a Morning Person

string.name: desc
string.value: This extremely useful and not at all patronizing self-help book will help you become a morning person. It will also help you pass the Mesoranger Action Exam.

string.name: name
string.value: A Better You: Learning to Laugh at Yourself

string.name: desc
string.value: This extremely useful and not at all patronizing self-help book will help you learn the joy of laughing at yourself. It will also help you pass the Mesoranger Action Exam.

string.value: A Better You: Learning to Dress Yourself

string.value: This extremely useful and not at all patronizing self-help book will teach you how to put on pants, one leg at a time. It will also help you pass the Mesoranger Action Exam.

string.value: [For Exhibition Only] You are a fish, not a robot! Silly fish.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Extremely dangerous and environmentally friendly.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] This totally isn't just some accidental leftover from that time the janitor kicked out the power at the Marine Museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] It's so absurdly adorable, you just want to cut something.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] A famous swordsman once bought this from a guy for way too much and then had to pawn it.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] A lid from the legendary golden ramen pot. A perfect weapon for grandmas.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Can clothes be a weapon? No. That's ridiculous.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] The blacksmith who made this was terribly fond of amphibians.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Moon prism-- wait, no, wrong one.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] A Gingerbread Man so realistic, you'll probably end up eating this before it makes it to the museum.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Don't tell anybody, but there's an actual human heart inside that heart. Gross... yet tasty.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] She just might come to life. Hopefully she's not super evil.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] This cake is a lie. It's actually all vanilla with food brown coloring.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] There's some legend about a crow or something, but mostly these are just cookies.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] If you fight through a layer of sugar goo, you'll get to the sweet ice cream center inside.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] Preferred by old ladies 'round the world.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] The Empress Cygnus had this commissioned, but she fell asleep before it was ready.

string.name: desc
string.value: [For Exhibition Only] A chef at a 5-star hotel made this cookie. Other cookies taste like garbage in comparison.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cage built just right for Pigmys. The little fellow in here might even be the same one the Maple Admin is looking for!

string.name: desc
string.value: Oh my gosh, did you see how cute she was?!! I THINK SHE TOUCHED MY HAND! Recovers 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.
